name: Flintlock Shot
description:
shoots for 107 - 160 + 134% Weapon Damage and generating two Pips. 

If Flintlock Shot hits an Exposed enemy while they attack or use an ability they are knocked down, and take additional damage and you generate an additional Pip. 

Basic Saber Attacks and Pistol Shots have a chance to reset the cooldown of Flintlock Shot.

This attack can be instantly Flash-Cast.
